alert.note: Alert for Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 3:16AM EST until February 23 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. The strongest wind gusts will be immediately downslope of the Western Maine mountains and northern Whites. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Southern Coos County. In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
